overview.en: Gimmer is designing the most sophisticated decentralized trading platform available today, incorporating advanced trading indicators and Artificial Intelligence (AI) decision-making tools in Gimmer auto trading bots. The platform is quick and easy to use and accessible to all customers, no matter what their background or level of trading experience.
overview.zh: Gimmer正在設計當今最先進的分散交易平台，它將先進的交易指標和人工智能（AI）決策工具整合到Gimmer汽車交易機器人中。 無論其背景或交易經驗水平如何，該平台都可以快速輕鬆地被所有客戶使用和訪問。
